summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the 2005 Adopted Budget, including the 2005- 2010 Capital Improvement Program (CIP); changing appropriations to various departments and from various funds in the Budget; making cash transfers between various City funds and sub funds; creating positions, one of which is exempt from the Civil Service; abrogating positions; and amending the CIP; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
